<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clinging Shadows Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=1745) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 129 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
ki spells

</column>

---

You learn a mystical stance that transforms your ki into sticky smoke that shrouds your limbs, clinging to everything you touch. You gain the [_clinging shadows stance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=737) ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. While entering the stance uses a ki spell, the shadow grasp attacks it grants are not, so you can use them as often as you like while in the stance.
name: Clinging Shadows Initiate
